name: cfstoredproc
description:
Executes a stored procedure in a server database. It
 specifies database connection information and identifies
 the stored procedure.

params.name: procedure
params.description: Name of stored procedure on database server.

params.name: datasource
params.description:
Name of data source that points to database that contains
 stored procedure.

params.name: username
params.description: Overrides username in data source setup.

params.name: password
params.description: Overrides password in data source setup.

params.name: blockfactor
params.description:
Maximum number of rows to get at a time from server.
 Range is 1 to 100.

params.name: debug
params.description:
Yes: Lists debug information on each statement
 No: does not

params.name: returncode
params.description:
Yes: Tag populates cfstoredproc.statusCode with status
 code returned by stored procedure.
 No: does not

params.name: result
params.description:
Specifies a name for the structure in which cfstoredproc
 returns the statusCode and ExecutionTime variables. If
 set, this value replaces cfstoredproc as the prefix to
 use when accessing those variables.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: Basic example of calling a stored procedure, passing a parameter, and getting a result set.

examples.title: Script Syntax
examples.description: Call stored procedure and get back multiple result sets.

examples.title: Scripted Tag Syntax (for Lucee)
examples.description: Call stored procedure and get back multiple result sets.
